response.overview: Divya, a 23-year-old happy-go-lucky college student, enjoys a joyful life with her college mates and boyfriend, Prem. Prem, an orphan, loves Divya unconditionally. Raised by her father, Thambiraja, a well-known businessman, with the support of his two best friends, Dr. Rahim and Saamy, Divya has been showered with love and luxury despite being motherless for almost 20 years. Life takes a drastic turn for Divya when she receives a call from Dr. Rahim, informing her that Thambiraja is unwell. Rushing from college with Prem to meet her father, Divya learns that Thambiraja suffered a heart attack due to serious depression from loneliness. Dr. Rahim further reveals that Divya has a family back in Kuching and advises her to find and bring them to Thambiraja to save him from depression.
response.title: MR & MRS
